name: Blueberry Yogurt Pancakes
description: Thin, crispyâ€‘edged blueberry pancakes with creamy yogurt in the batter and a touch of lemon; serve with maple syrup and extra blueberries.

ingredients.name: unsalted butter, melted (plus more for the pan)
fresh blueberries, plus more for serving

steps.description: Mix the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt together in a small bowl.

In a medium bowl whisk the eggs lightly, then whisk in the milk, yogurt, vanilla, melted butter, and lemon juice. Add the flour mixture and gently stir until combined; do not overmix. Fold in the blueberries.

Melt a couple tablespoons of butter in a large skillet over medium heat. When very hot, ladle in batter using roughly 1/2 cup per pancake. Cook until bubbles burst, about 2 minutes, then flip and cook another minute until lightly browned.
Repeat with more butter and batter until all the mixture is used. Serve with maple syrup and extra blueberries.
